videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: The craziest brawl deck of the year.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a cascade combo deck, featuring Monstrous Vortex and Imoti as commander in Brawl.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

24:56 - vs Vren, the Relentless
28:09 - vs Emmara, Soul of the Accord
38:29 - vs Miirym, Sentinel Wyrm
43:49 - vs Glarb, Calamity's Augur
52:24 - vs Rakdos, the Muscle
54:24 - vs Nicol Bolas, the Ravager
